title: (x) EBay logo - Univers {Adriano S}
content:
Does anyone know the typeface used for the eBay logo font?   
I know the letters are distorted, however what is it likely to be?
author: owaters

comments.content:
You're just too darn fast, Adriano... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20090412040400im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) It looks like   
Univers indeed.
